page.title: 13Employment _ trends
page.content:
{TRENDS:_
The tradition of {Seafarers} in Islandmagee continues even though the size of the world's Merchant Fleets has dwindled. There are fewer seamen on 'Foreign_Going' voyages now and the majority are on the Cross_Channel Ferries from Larne or in the Pilotage in Carrickfergus.
There is an ever increasing number of {Working Wives.}This is particularly noticeable in the percentage of farmers' wives who continue with their careers after marriage, whereas in the past they had a traditional role on the farm.
